Panic disorder.description: A type of anxiety disorder characterized by sudden and repeated episodes of intense fear or discomfort, often accompanied by physical symptoms such as heart palpitations, sweating, or dizziness.
Panic disorder.solution: Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT). Medications such as SSRIs or benzodiazepines. Relaxation techniques and lifestyle modifications.
Panic disorder.symptoms: Palpitations, Sweating, Trembling, Shortness of breath, Fear of losing control, Dizziness

Coronary Atherosclerosis.description: Hardening and narrowing of coronary arteries due to plaque buildup, leading to reduced blood flow to the heart.
Coronary Atherosclerosis.solution: Lifestyle changes, including a healthy diet, regular exercise, and smoking cessation. Use medications like statins to lower cholesterol, beta-blockers, or ACE inhibitors. Perform procedures such as angioplasty with stenting or coronary artery bypass surgery for severe cases.
Coronary Atherosclerosis.symptoms: Chest pain or discomfort (angina), shortness of breath, fatigue, irregular heartbeat, dizziness, nausea, sweating, jaw or arm pain (in some cases), heart attack (when a coronary artery becomes completely blocked)

Panic Attack.description: Sudden and intense episodes of fear or anxiety, often accompanied by physical symptoms like palpitations, shortness of breath, and dizziness.
Panic Attack.solution: Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT). Medications such as selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs). Breathing exercises and relaxation techniques. Benzodiazepines for short-term relief in acute situations.
Panic Attack.symptoms: Chest pain, shortness of breath, palpitations

Ethylene glycol poisoning-2.description: A presentation of antifreeze poisoning with central nervous system depression and acidosis.
Ethylene glycol poisoning-2.solution: Administration of fomepizole or ethanol as antidotes. Supportive care and hemodialysis.
Ethylene glycol poisoning-2.symptoms: Metabolic acidosis, apid breathing, rapid heart rate, confusion, headache, dizziness, seizures
